plot: Paul Black has just been released from prison after serving 15 years for armed robbery. He's written a novel called "Crime Lord" He now uses his writing as a front for his real criminal empire ambitions
title: Crime Lord
plot_es: Paul Black has just been released from prison after serving 15 years for armed robbery. He's written a novel called "Crime Lord" He now uses his writing as a front for his real criminal empire ambitions
plot_en: Paul Black has just been released from prison after serving 15 years for armed robbery. He's written a novel called "Crime Lord" He now uses his writing as a front for his real criminal empire ambitions
